product_desc:
Moondani is the first ever breath spray that is not only natural, but tasty, and fits stylishly into your daily beauty routine.  Fresh breath should be as essential as lip gloss and mascara and it should look great in a makeup bag or purse without the chemicals. 
 
It is made of herbs that naturally freshen breath.  The main ingredient is cardamom which is a natural breath freshener and has a host of other benefits as well.  All ingredients are either organic or non-gmo.  
 
It is completely natural with a pleasing taste and works to freshen breath without just masking it like gum or tic tacs.  The unique blend was inspired by ancient middle eastern customs and the word 'Moondani' means everlasting in Farsi.  We love Moondani's exotic flavor and are committed to using only the purest ingredients so that everyone has a chance to experience everlasting fresh breath.
name: Moondani
